an3.147:1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.147:1.3: Sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena—
an3.147:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.147:2.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an3.147:2.3: Anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena—
